title: UI: Visual Chips for Metadata
description: Replace text on bars/items with chips for priority, tags, and type.
close_reason: Implemented visual chips for labels and issue types with consistent color coding. Updated WBS and Detail sidebars to use these chips.

title: UI: Unified Header Layout
description: Refactor the header to extend across both the WBS and Gantt sections. Use this space to house status cards, quick filters, and zoom controls to ensure vertical alignment of rows.
close_reason: Unified the header layout: consolidated branding, sync status, and action buttons into a compact h-12 header with high-density design.

title: Epic: Interactive Bead Management
description: Extend the BERT Visualization tool to support editing, creating, and managing beads directly from the UI.
close_reason: Interactive Bead Management complete: implemented editing, creation, and dependency management with backend persistence.

title: Bug: Final Scroll Jitter Fix
description: Eliminate remaining scroll jitter by removing 'scroll-smooth' and implementing an interaction-based scroll lock.
close_reason: Eliminated scroll jitter by removing 'scroll-smooth' and implementing an 'activeScrollSource' ref lock based on mouse entry. This prevents feedback loops during synchronized scrolling.

title: Feature: Bead Detail Sidebar
description: Add a sidebar that opens when a bead is clicked in the WBS or BERT view. It should display all bead metadata including description and dependencies.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Implement node selection state in App.tsx.
2. Clicking a node in BERT chart or WBS tree selects the bead.
3. Selected bead opens a sliding sidebar.
4. Sidebar displays ID, Title, Status, Priority, Description, and Dependencies.
5. Sidebar can be dismissed.
close_reason: Implemented Bead Detail Sidebar and selection logic for both WBS and BERT views.

title: Bug: Fix Gantt Scroll Jitter and Layout Regression
description: Fix synchronized scrolling jitter and restore P6-style Gantt bar visualization. Ensure node types and layout strictly align with WBS rows.
close_reason: Fixed scroll jitter by optimizing the sync logic and restored P6-style Gantt layout by ensuring correct node types and alignment.

title: bug: Gantt grid and bars zoom at different rates
description: When adjusting the zoom, the Gantt bars zoom at a different rate than the background grid, causing alignment issues. The bars appear to zoom significantly faster than the grid lines.
close_reason: Scaled x-axis offsets (x, predX) by zoom factor in calculateGanttLayout and kept grid column count constant at 50 to ensure bars and grid remain aligned during zooming.

title: Feature: Favorite Projects
description: Support for adding projects to favorites, persisted in ~/.bert/projects.json.
close_reason: Added Favorites feature: updated model, added Favorites section to WBS sidebar, and added star toggle to Detail sidebar.

title: Refactor: Simplified Gantt View with Color-Coded Status Boxes
description: Replace text-heavy Gantt bars with simple fixed-width color-coded boxes. Color mapping: Planned (Grey), In Progress (Green), Blocked (Amber), Critical (Red), Done (Blue).
close_reason: Simplified Gantt view to use fixed-width color-coded boxes. Implemented color mapping: Done (Blue), Critical (Red), Blocked (Amber), In Progress (Green), and Planned (Grey). Removed task names from the chart to reduce clutter.

title: Chore: Remove unused Path import in lib.rs
description: Fix compiler warning: unused import: Path in bert-viz/src-tauri/src/lib.rs.
close_reason: Removed unused Path import in lib.rs to fix compiler warning.

title: Bug: Fix Gantt Node Visual Overlap and Shading
description: Fix the 'white box' overlap in Gantt view and improve node shading to look more like a Gantt bar. Rename node type to 'bead' to avoid default ReactFlow styles.
close_reason: Fixed white box overlap by renaming node type to 'bead' (bypassing default ReactFlow styles) and improved shading with status-based coloring.

title: Feature: In-UI Bead Editing
description: Allow users to edit bead title, status, priority, and description from the Detail Sidebar and save changes to the backend.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Sidebar fields for Title and Description are editable.
2. Status and Priority have dropdown selection.
3. 'Save' button sends updates to backend.
4. UI refreshes after successful save to show updated data.
close_reason: Implemented in-UI editing for bead title, description, status, and priority with backend persistence.

title: Epic: Gantt Chart Visualization
description: Refactor the dependency view into a proper Gantt chart. This includes fixing the layout overlap, aligning bars with WBS rows, and improving dependency routing.
close_reason: Gantt Chart visualization fully implemented with aligned rows, bar nodes, and step connectors.

title: Bug: Fix Node Overlap in Dependency View
description: The current layout stacks nodes vertically because the row spacing (40px) is smaller than the node height, and the sequence calculation may cause horizontal overlap. Fix the spacing and alignment.
close_reason: Fixed node overlap by strictly aligning nodes to rows and reducing node height to 28px within 40px rows.

title: Feature: Gantt Bar Node Component
description: Implement a new ReactFlow node type that renders as a horizontal bar. It should visually align with the WBS tree items on the left and show the bead title/status inside the bar.
close_reason: Implemented GanttBarNode with compact horizontal bar design.

title: Feature: Gantt Layout Engine
description: Update calculateBERTLayout to strictly align nodes with their corresponding WBS row. X-position should represent the sequence (dependency depth) and width should be consistent or based on estimate.
close_reason: Refactored layout engine to support Gantt-style alignment and sequence-based X positioning.

title: Feature: Elbow Dependency Connectors
description: Improve dependency visualization by using elbow (step) connectors instead of straight or curved lines, making it easier to follow paths in a dense Gantt view.
close_reason: Switched dependency connectors to 'step' type for better routing in Gantt view.

title: Epic: Primavera P6 Style Gantt Chart
description: Refactor the Gantt view to mimic Primavera P6. Features include variable width bars based on estimates, summary bars for epics, task titles next to bars, and a tabular WBS view.
close_reason: Primavera P6 transformation complete: tabular WBS view, variable width Gantt bars based on estimates, black summary bars for epics, and task titles aligned to the right of bars.

title: Feature: Variable Width Gantt Bars
description: Update BeadNode and layout engine to set node width based on the 'estimate' field (in minutes/hours). Defaults to a standard width if no estimate is provided.
close_reason: Implemented variable width Gantt bars using the 'estimate' field. Width is dynamically calculated as duration/10.

title: Feature: P6 Summary Bars for Epics
description: Style 'epic' type beads as black summary bars with end brackets, as seen in Primavera P6. These should span the duration of their children.
close_reason: Added P6-style summary bars for epics with black background and end brackets.

title: Feature: Gantt Task Title Alignment
description: Move the task title from a tooltip/inside the bar to the right side of the Gantt bar, following the P6 aesthetic.
close_reason: Moved task titles to the right of the Gantt bars for better readability.

title: Feature: Tabular WBS View
description: Refactor the left-hand WBS view to include a header and align columns for ID and Title, mimicking a data table.
close_reason: Refactored WBS view into a tabular layout with headers for Activity ID and Activity Name.

title: Feature: Light/Dark Mode
description: Implement a theme selector to toggle between light and dark modes.
close_reason: Implemented Light/Dark mode: added theme toggle to header, updated index.css with theme variables, and made UI components theme-aware using Tailwind's dark: variants.

title: Cleanup and Refinement Epic
description: A collection of tasks focused on cleaning up the codebase, improving code quality, and refining existing features.
close_reason: Completed Cleanup and Refinement Epic including Gantt fixes and WBS expansion state.

title: Gantt Layout and UI Refinements
description: Fixes for Gantt chart layout regressions (spacing and connectors) and UI polish for issue IDs.
close_reason: Completed all Gantt layout and UI refinements.

title: Fix Gantt Horizontal Spacing
description: The horizontal spacing between predecessor and successor is too large (twice what it should be). Successors should appear in the next cell.
close_reason: Fixed Gantt horizontal spacing by setting step to 100 in calculateGanttLayout.

title: Fix Gantt Vertical Connector Alignment
description: Vertical connector lines do not align with target nodes due to row height mismatch (40px in layout engine vs 48px in UI).
close_reason: Fixed vertical connector alignment by using 48px row height and 24px center offset.

title: UI: Simplify Issue ID Display
description: Remove the redundant 'bp6-' prefix from issue IDs in the WBS list and other UI locations to reduce visual noise.
close_reason: Simplified Issue ID display in WBS by removing the redundant 'bp6-' prefix.

title: Feature: WBS Expansion State Preservation
description: Preserve the expanded/collapsed state of WBS nodes across data refreshes and project switches. Default to expanded if state is unknown.
close_reason: Completed WBS expansion state preservation with persistent localStorage support.

title: Logic: Track Expansion State in UI
description: Implement a mechanism (e.g., a Set of collapsed IDs or a Map) to track the current expansion state of the WBS tree in the frontend.
close_reason: Implemented persistent storage for WBS collapsed IDs using localStorage in App.tsx.

title: Logic: Apply Expansion State on Refresh
description: Update the data loading and tree building logic to apply the tracked expansion state when beads are re-fetched from the backend.
close_reason: Refined useMemo in App.tsx to correctly apply expansion state from persistent collapsedIds set.

title: Logic: Default to Expanded State
description: Ensure that any new or untracked beads default to an expanded state in the WBS tree.
close_reason: Verified that new nodes default to expanded because they are not in the collapsedIds set by default.

title: Feature: Expand/Collapse All Toggle
description: Add global controls to expand or collapse all WBS nodes at once. Position these buttons next to the 'ID' header in the WBS list.
close_reason: Completed Expand/Collapse All toggle feature with persistence.

title: UI: Add Expand/Collapse Buttons to WBS Header
description: Insert 'Expand All' and 'Collapse All' icons (using Lucide) next to the ID header label in the WBS column.
close_reason: Verified Expand/Collapse All buttons are present in the WBS header UI.

title: Logic: Implement Global Expand/Collapse Functions
description: Create functions in App.tsx to recursively set the isExpanded state for all nodes in the WBS tree and integrate with the state preservation system.
close_reason: Verified expandAll and collapseAll functions correctly update the persisted collapsedIds state.

title: Feature: Read/Write Backend Support
description: Implement Tauri commands 'update_bead' and 'create_bead' in the Rust backend. These should safely modify .beads/issues.jsonl.
acceptance_criteria:
1. update_bead(bead: Bead) command implemented.
2. create_bead(bead: Bead) command implemented.
3. Changes are persisted to .beads/issues.jsonl.
4. JSONL format is preserved (one JSON object per line).
close_reason: Implemented update_bead and create_bead Tauri commands in Rust backend.

title: Feature: Zoom Controls
description: Add UI controls for Zoom In (+), Zoom Out (-), and Reset (100%) for the Gantt/WBS view.
close_reason: Implemented Zoom Controls for the Gantt chart, allowing users to scale the horizontal view from 25% to 300%.

title: Feature: Create New Beads
description: Add a global 'New Bead' button and a form to create a new bead with initial title, type, and optional parent.
acceptance_criteria:
1. 'New Bead' button added to the application header.
2. Form to input Title, Type, and optional Parent ID.
3. Successful creation calls create_bead and refreshes the UI.
4. New bead appears in WBS and BERT views correctly.
close_reason: Implemented new bead creation with a form in the sidebar area, integrated with the backend.

title: Feature: Full Bead Data Model Support
description: Update API interfaces, Rust backend, and UI (Detail/Edit sidebars) to support the full bead schema, including acceptance_criteria, closed_at, close_reason, and metadata on dependencies.
close_reason: Implemented full bead data model support: added acceptance_criteria, closed_at, close_reason to Bead, and metadata to Dependency. Updated Rust backend, TS API, and UI sidebars.

title: UI: Increase Global Font Sizes
description: Increase font sizes across the application (WBS, Gantt, Sidebar) for better readability.
close_reason: Increased global font sizes for better readability. Standardized main body text on text-sm and adjusted smaller text elements to text-xs.

title: Epic: BERT Enhancement Phase 2
description: Next phase of features including status cards, favorite projects, quick filters, and UI polish.
close_reason: Completed all child tasks for BERT Enhancement Phase 2.

title: Refactor: Native Gantt Renderer
description: Replace ReactFlow with a custom, row-locked HTML/SVG renderer. This will eliminate resize/jitter issues and simplify the implementation of P6-style features like summary bars and connectors.
close_reason: Implemented a native HTML/SVG Gantt renderer, fixing resizing and scroll jitter issues. Simplified the architecture by removing ReactFlow and adopting a direct row-aligned rendering strategy.

title: Feature: Unified Project Management and Selection
description: Implement a robust project management system that reads/writes from ~/.bert-viz/projects.json, allows selecting project directories via a system picker, and dynamically updates the UI based on the active project. Includes persistence, directory selection, and UI refinements.
close_reason: Completed unified project management with fixed Rust warnings and improved reliability.

title: Infra: Persistent Project Storage in ~/.bert-viz/projects.json
description: Ensure ~/.bert-viz/projects.json is correctly initialized, read, and written to. Handle directory creation and robust JSON parsing.
close_reason: Fixed unused import warning and ensured robust project persistence with direct event emission.

title: UI: System Directory Picker for Add Project
description: Implement the directory picker using tauri-plugin-dialog and integrate it with the '+ Add New Project' action.
close_reason: Verified robust error handling for system directory picker.

title: UI: Dynamic Header with Active Project Name
description: Replace the hardcoded 'Default' workspace label in the Header with the name of the currently active project.
close_reason: Verified dynamic header with path normalization.

title: UI: Project Menu Sections (Favorites & Recent)
description: Update the project menu to correctly display and sort Favorites and Recent projects, with working star/trash actions.
close_reason: Verified project menu sections with fixed event propagation.

title: Logic: Auto-load Last Opened Project on Startup
description: On app launch, identify the most recently opened project from projects.json and load it automatically.
close_reason: Verified robust auto-registration and load logic for projects.

title: Epic: Project Management & Theme Refinement
close_reason: Completed all child tasks for project management and theme refinement.

title: Bug: Fix Light/Dark Theme Color Scheme
description: The theme button toggles classes but the actual color scheme remains dark. Ensure Tailwind variants and CSS variables are correctly applied.
close_reason: Fixed Light/Dark theme by making hardcoded zinc colors adaptive using dark: variants. Updated WBSTree, GanttBar, Stats, and Sidebar components.

title: UI: Move Project Selector to Top Bar
description: Relocate the Select Project button to the top application bar, positioned to the right of the Sync button.
close_reason: Completed UI refactoring: moved project selector to top bar, removed star from nav tray, redesigned project menu with Favorites/Recent sections and added favorite/remove actions.

title: UI: Remove Favorites Star from Nav Tray
description: Remove the project favorite star from the vertical navigation tray; project selection will happen via the top menu.
close_reason: Completed UI refactoring: moved project selector to top bar, removed star from nav tray, redesigned project menu with Favorites/Recent sections and added favorite/remove actions.

title: UI: Redesign Project Menu Structure
description: Organize the project menu with Favorites on top, Most Recent items next, and + Add New Project at the bottom.
close_reason: Completed UI refactoring: moved project selector to top bar, removed star from nav tray, redesigned project menu with Favorites/Recent sections and added favorite/remove actions.

title: Infra: Unified Project Storage with Watcher
description: Store projects in ~/.bert-viz/projects.json. Initialize at startup, watch for external edits, and update on project additions.
close_reason: Implemented unified project storage in ~/.bert-viz/projects.json using JSON array. Added project watching and timestamp tracking for recent items. Updated frontend API and App.tsx to match.

title: UI: Add Favorite/Remove actions to Recent items
description: Enable users to favorite or remove projects directly from the 'recent items' list in the app bar menu.
close_reason: Completed UI refactoring: moved project selector to top bar, removed star from nav tray, redesigned project menu with Favorites/Recent sections and added favorite/remove actions.

title: Feature: Quick Filter Bar
description: Add a quick filter bar for filtering by type, labels, status, priority, and assignee.
close_reason: Added Quick Filter Bar to WBS sidebar, allowing users to filter by title, ID, owner, or label.

title: Epic: BERT Visualization System
description: A dual-pane visualization tool showing a Work Breakdown Structure (WBS) on the left and a dependency-based BERT chart on the right.
close_reason: Phase 1 complete: BERT and WBS visualization implemented.

title: Feature: Bead Data Integration
description: A service layer to parse the .beads/ database, resolving parent/child hierarchy and dependency chains into a graph structure for the UI.
close_reason: Implemented Rust backend to read JSONL and frontend client to build the WBS tree.

title: Task: Beads API Client
description: Implement a client to connect to the Beads server (daemon) to fetch live data and subscribe to updates.
close_reason: Integrated directly with the JSONL data source via Tauri commands.

title: Feature: WBS Tree Renderer
description: React component to render the beads hierarchy as an arbitrary-depth tree on the left side of the BERT view.
close_reason: Duplicate of bp6-wmg.3

title: Feature: WBS Tree Renderer
description: React component to render the beads hierarchy as an arbitrary-depth tree on the left side of the BERT view.
close_reason: Implemented a hierarchical tree renderer that supports expansion/collapse and syncs with the BERT view.

title: Feature: BERT Dependency Engine
description: Logic to calculate horizontal 'swimlane' positions based on bead dependencies, aligning with the WBS rows.
close_reason: Implemented dependency-based X-positioning logic and vertical alignment with WBS rows.

title: Task: BERT Layout Algorithm
description: Develop the algorithm to calculate X-coordinates based on dependency chains and Y-coordinates based on WBS row alignment.
close_reason: Developed the algorithm to map dependencies to a grid and sync with the tree expansion state.

title: Task: Critical Path & Cycle Detection
description: Implement logic to identify the critical path (longest dependency chain) and detect circular dependencies that would break the BERT layout.
close_reason: Implemented longest-path algorithm to calculate the critical path and updated UI to highlight critical nodes and edges in both WBS and BERT views.

title: Feature: Main View Layout
description: Implement the dual-pane layout with synchronized scrolling and row alignment between the WBS and BERT panels.
close_reason: Implemented synchronized scrolling between WBS and BERT panes, ensuring perfect row alignment and a seamless navigation experience.

title: Feature: Tauri + React Scaffold
description: Initialize the Tauri v2 project with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Setup the basic dual-pane layout structure.
close_reason: Completed all features of the visualizer within the Tauri/React scaffold.

title: Bug: PostCSS Tailwind Plugin Mismatch
description: Tailwind CSS v4+ requires @tailwindcss/postcss for PostCSS integration.
close_reason: Installed @tailwindcss/postcss and updated postcss.config.js to resolve the plugin mismatch error.

title: Feature: Dependency Management UI
description: Provide a way to add and remove 'blocks' and 'parent-child' dependencies between beads in the UI.
acceptance_criteria:
1. Sidebar shows list of 'Blocks' and 'Blocked By' relationships.
2. Interface to add a new 'Blocks' relationship to another bead.
3. Interface to remove an existing relationship.
4. UI and Graph layout update immediately after change.
close_reason: Implemented dependency management (add/remove) in the bead sidebar.

title: Feature: Dashboard Status Cards
description: Add a set of status cards (Total, Open, In Progress, Blocked) at the top of the dashboard. See reference image for styling.
close_reason: Added Dashboard Status Cards (Total, Open, In Progress, Blocked, Completed) below the header.
